title: Covid Relief Fund Used For Buying Police Tech
description:
Despite calls to fund life-sustaining food and housing programs, President Biden has encouraged more spending on police tech. Almost as if he’s expecting people to be angry about something. 
#Covid #Pandemic #Police

References
https://www.vice.com/en/article/pkp8zg/police-are-buying-drones-and-armored-vehicles-with-covid-relief-funds

title: Fast Food Does WHAT To Covid?!
description:
We should do whatever it takes to protect the vulnerable from Covid, right? Doesn’t seem that way.  
#Pandemic #Covid #FastFood 

References
https://scholarworks.uark.edu/jflp/vol6/iss1/4/

https://www.nationofchange.org/2022/03/23/toxic-chemicals-in-food-packaging-weaken-our-immune-system-response-to-covid-19-when-will-congress-ban-them/
